name: King of Sumo
description:
One of the best party game on iPad for 1-4 players!
Are you ready to party with friends or family members?

1. Control a wacky looking sumo wrestler.
2. Knock other sumo wrestlers off the elevated ring.
3. Fight against your friends or the computer.
4. Up to 4 players on the same iPad.
5. Three unique rings to keep the fighting fresh.
6. Beautiful graphics, cool music and funny sound effects.
7. Easy to play for everyone and suitable for all ages, young and old!


If you prefer an ads free experience, you can download the "King of Sumo Pro" app:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/king-of-sumo-pro/id949079192
